text: Obama's news conference a singer turned
activist and surfboard entrepreneurs
good evening this is the New York Times
minute a challenging press conference
for President Obama with pointed
questions on topics ranging from the NSA
to health care the president seemed to
offer a scale back sense of ambition
while also touting his achievements more
than half a million Americans have been
rolled through healthcare.gov and as
protests continue in the Ukraine meet
ruslana she was a pop singer but is now
a mainstay of Independence Square she
works the overnight shift her job is to
keep protesters upbeat and energize
through the cold nights and while it
hasn't been surfing weather in New York
for quite a while a look via the sunday
business section at to longboard
innovators the Wagoner brothers make
boards inspired by an ancient design
also by opting for real wood over
fiberglass they've created a more
durable board and a growing business
